summary: This mod adds the Ancient Falmer Crown to Arch-Curate Vyrthur\'s inventory. It also changes the crown from jewelry to an armor piece with appropriate armor rating; thus filling out the set that couldn\'t be completed otherwise.
descriptionHtml:
=================
Description:
=================
For some reason, Bethesda decided to not include the Ancient Falmer Crown as an obtainable item in the game (a bug in my opinion). This left the Ancient Falmer Crown set pretty much unusable  since you get a huge armor rating boost in Skyrim for having a full set of one kind of armor. The only alternative was to wear the elven helmet, but that looks weird in my opinion.

The armor itself is of elven material but of glass armor rating. So what I did was I modified the ancient falmer crown from a 0.00 armor rating to a 16.0 armor rating to match the glass helmet. I also changed it from a circlet to an armor head piece (meaning you can\'t wear it with Archmage\'s Robes or The Jagged Crown like it says here:
http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ancient_Falmer_Crown. 
And I changed the material to consider it a piece of elven made armor instead of jewelry. 

There are two versions of the mod: One that has the crown in Vythur\'s inventory (but not wearing it), thus making him look just like he already does in Skyrim and an alternate version that has him wearing it (which I would assume gives him a higher armor rating as well).

=================
Requirements:
=================
Dawnguard

=================
Compatibility:
=================
Compatible with anything that doesn\'t modify the crown itself or Arch-Curate Vyrthur.

=================
Legal Usage:
================= 
Just ask me first if you want to use the mod for anything.

=================
Inspiration:
=================
GrZDem\'s mod does a similar thing: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21696 
but he just made Vyrthur equip the crown and it had no armor rating or material. And since he doesn\'t seem to be updating it, I wanted to fix that since I think it\'s a really cool piece of armor (probably my favorite in the game aesthetically). Thus I made this from scratch.

=================
Installation:
=================
It\'s just an .esp so you can just press the \"Download With NMM\" button or drop it into your data folder. Esp can be loaded anywhere.

=================
Other Stuff
=================
This is my first \"mod\" and I tried to keep it as clean in the Creation Kit as possible. All I did was modify the crown itself and Vyrthur, but please let me know if I did anything inefficiently and if there are any bugs. Thank you.
author: Zerocloud411

files.name: Ancient Falmer Crown
files.changelogHtml:
Ancient Falmer Crown's armor rating change from "0.00" to "16.0".
Ancient Falmer Crown's Biped Object changed from "42 - Circlet" to "31 - Hair & 42 - Circlet".
Ancient Falmer Crown's keywords changed from jewelry circlet default to elven helmet default.
Added to Arch-Curate Vyrthur's inventory or outfit depending on .esp.

files.name: Ancient Falmer Crown - Outfit

Ancient Falmer Crown's armor rating change from "0.00" to "16.0".
Ancient Falmer Crown's Biped Object changed from "42 - Circlet" to "31 - Hair & 42 - Circlet".

Added to Arch-Curate Vyrthur's inventory or outfit depending on .esp.
